message.body: I'm staying with Lucien for the next few days if you wana stop in and drink a beer
Funny, I was just thinking of you. I'm working tonight, tomorrow and Friday night - all till 11ish. Not sure how late you'll be up, but it would be good to see you.
Humm yeah I gota be up at quarter to five, maybe tomorrow night I'll plan to stay up late, does that work for you?
Sure. It might not be till 11:30, though. You can decide tomorrow. You staying with Luc thru the weekend?
Ok, how about I text when finished tmrw. If you're still awake and feel like hanging, I'll stop by. If not, another time.
